fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Manipulate a player each night.
Manipulated players are by all means controlled at night.
- Call for a Speech during the day.
When you call for a Speech, House Eversol members may choose one person today: All selected players are anonymously put into a text channel.
If one of these players are kill-capable and the others arent, the kill capable person is converted into a House Eversol non-power role, and the rest are role-blocked tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you direct a Manipulated player to yourself, you gain Basic defense tonight.
- You cannot Manipulate the same player twice in a row.
If you attempt to do this, your ability fails, but you still visit.
- You cannot call court if a House Eversol member died last night.
